articles.author: Maria Merano
articles.title: S&P Global retires numerical ESG credit indicators amid criticism - TESLARATI
articles.description: The update comes amid questions and criticism about the utility of ESG scores, as well as political pressures against the metrics.
articles.content:
S&P Global has halted its use of numerical ESG scores. The update comes amid questions and criticism about the utility of ESG scores, as well as political pressures against the metrics.

articles.author: Matt Discombe
articles.title: NHSE rows with royal college over 'unhelpful' virtual ward targets - Health Service Journal
articles.description: NHS England’s virtual wards target is leading to some lower risk patients being ‘over-monitored’ in pursuit of a headline ambition ahead of winter, a leading royal college has told HSJ.
